profile.name: Bryson Tang
profile.tagline: Chief AI Officer | AI Systems Architect | MLOps Engineer
profile.bio: Builder & AI Engineer shipping production AI systems since 2021. Architected sub-1s semantic search across 300k documents using vector embeddings + MongoDB hybrid queries. Created Agent Tokens Protocol (open standard for AI agent identity). Built 5-agent orchestration pipeline handling 150k+ line edits with zero regressions. WPI Data Science graduate (3.75 GPA, High Distinction). BlueDot AI Safety Alignment certified.

projects.name: Agent Tokens Protocol
projects.description: A standard proposal for AI Agent Identity. Shifting from adversarial bot detection to declared cryptographic provenance.

projects.name: resume-mcp
projects.description: Your identity as an API endpoint. An MCP server that lets AI agents query your professional profile with structured tools instead of scraping HTML.

projects.name: Bloomdesk
projects.description: Addressing the Translation Gap between users and engineers. An intelligent pipeline that converts vague bug reports into structured, high-entropy technical tickets using LLMs.

projects.name: DeltaTask
projects.description: An MCP server that enables AI assistants to manage tasks in Obsidian. Bridges the gap between conversational AI and personal knowledge management.

projects.name: crystallize
projects.description: A lightweight framework for rigorous, reproducible data science. Solving the hidden state problem of Jupyter notebooks by enforcing a Pipeline-as-Code philosophy.

projects.name: ai-safety-compass
projects.description: An interactive tool for exploring AI safety perspectives and frameworks. Visualize where different approaches fall on the safety landscape.

projects.name: gcomm
projects.description: A Rust CLI for seamless communication with Ollama models. Fast, ergonomic, and designed for developer workflows.

writing.title: Your Prompt's Favorite Prompt
writing.description: Meta-prompting techniques and recursive prompt engineering.

writing.description: Using recursive logic to generate organic forms in generative art.

writing.title: Creating a Nostr Client in TypeScript
writing.description: Building decentralized social applications on the Nostr protocol.

writing.title: p5.js Recursive Inscriptions Guide
writing.description: Guide to inscribing generative art on Bitcoin using p5.js.

experience.description: Lead AI architecture for video-based job matching platform processing 100k+ candidate profiles.
highlights: Founded Palmera Labs (internal R&D): RAG systems, agent frameworks, alignment research
Executed 50k+ line refactor across 800 files in 24 hours using 5-agent pipeline with orthogonal routing
Reduced idea-to-prototype cycle from 14 days to 2 days via scope-plan-prototype workflow
Shipped ATS with invisible-AI UX: predictive defaults, auto-structuring, safe undo patterns
Drove 466 merge requests with zero production regressions via automated guardrails

experience.description: Built semantic search and ML infrastructure for job matching platform.
highlights: Achieved sub-1s full-text search across 300k resume chunks via LLM/RAG + MongoDB hybrid filters
Architected Kern ML service: FastAPI intake → Kafka queue → Redis state → NestJS/Pusher delivery
Built universal matching algorithm using triplet loss embeddings + hybrid vector/text search
Created no-code interface enabling non-engineers to deploy Codex-generated branches to production

experience.description: Integrated AI capabilities and managed ML infrastructure.
highlights: Integrated ChatGPT API for automated client workflows, reducing response latency by 60%
Built RAG-powered support desk handling 500+ daily queries with 94% resolution rate
Designed vector-based matching algorithms using FAISS + MongoDB, improving match accuracy 35%
Managed Apache Airflow pipelines processing 10k+ documents/day with 99.9% data consistency

experience.description: Built cloud infrastructure and led post-acquisition technical integration.
highlights: Engineered AWS infrastructure (ECS, S3, Lambda) supporting 10k+ DAU with auto-scaling
Architected web platform extending mobile app, increasing user engagement 40%
Led post-acquisition technical integration: unified CI/CD, consolidated 3 codebases into 1

experience.role: Full Stack Engineer / Junior Data Scientist
experience.description: Built data platform and optimized search performance.
highlights: Built Vue.js + Express.js data entry platform from scratch, processing 50k+ records
Reduced Typesense query latency from 4s to 0.4s (10x improvement) via index tuning
Increased data production 125% by implementing work classification specializations
Created Tableau dashboards driving $2M+ in data-informed sales decisions
